item.title: Generating Trust Thousands of Miles Away in Cairo with LouderVoice Reviews
item.description:
The first thing I do when I land on a site I havenâ€™t used before is to check their reviews. Good or bad, I want to see that it is a company which values feedback and is actively providing services or products.

We were really excited recently to sign-up Floradoor in Cairo as our first African client. This high-end florist delivers flowers locally for a global customer base and it has been a joy to read their reviews.
